General.Name: Wuxi Dk Electronic Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Wuxi DK Electronic Materials Co.,Ltd., a technology company, engages in the research and development of performance materials for display and energy industries in China. The company offers front silver metallization paste for silicon solar cells. Wuxi DK Electronic Materials Co.,Ltd., was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Yixing, China.

1.Name: Ms. Jiaojiao  Wang
1.Title: Deputy GM, CFO, Accounting Supervisor & Director

3.Name: Mr. Hongwang  Zhang
3.Title: Deputy GM, R&D Director and Director
